projectDesc: Battleship is a strategic two-player board game where opponents secretly position their fleet of ships on a grid. Players take turns calling out coordinates to target and sink each other's ships. The goal is to be the first to destroy the opponent's entire fleet.

This weather app has a simple and intuitive interface that let you get updates on temperature, humidity, wind speed and more on the current time and also 7 days daily forecast so you can plan your days ahead. Never get caught off guard by the weather again.

This Simple Todo List App is a straightforward and user-friendly application designed to help users organize their tasks efficiently. The project features a clean and intuitive user interface, allowing users to easily add, edit, and delete tasks.

Enjoy a classic game of Tic Tac Toe right in your browser! Simply click to place your X or O strategically on the grid, aiming to line up three in a row horizontally, vertically, or diagonally to claim victory. It's a timeless game of strategy and fun for all ages!
Keep your book collection organized with this easy-to-use browser app. Input and track your books effortlessly. Never lose track of your reads again!
